[Between the Scales](/Feats.aspx?ID=5622) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You've learned to take advantage of slips in your foes' defenses. When you Strike an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creature using a melee weapon or unarmed attack that has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526) and [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=602) traits, it gains the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=544) trait.
